note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Victor Kareh
tagline: Professional Drupal and node.js development for functional websites.
body:
### Full-scale architecture
A good website architecture can simplify the development process and prevent feature creep.

I will help you create a blueprint of your website so that you are able to follow along the development process. It's your website: know what's in it.

### Website engineering
High quality engineering is necessary for a high quality website that's easy to use and maintain.

Let my engineering background take care of your website development process. It's your business: trust only a professional.

### Module development
Some ideas are completely new, and some might have solutions that require a bit of tweaking.

My proven track record of published modules has helped thousands of websites implement those ideas. It's your idea: let me help you too.
